text: Patrick Busolini (born 14 November 1954) is a former French racing cyclist. He rode in the 1979 and 1980 Tour de France. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists Category:People from Chaumont, Haute-Marne Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Haute-Marne
title: Patrick Busolini
